CustomField.description: Formula to derive a score based on complexity of connecting device to RALS
CustomField.formula: CASE(Contract.RALS_Module__c , "Abbott i-STAT POC", 0, "MTE - Manual Test Entry", 0, "Accriva Blood Oximeter (ITC Avoximeter)", 0, "Alere HbA1c", 0, "Alere Cholesterol/ HDL/Triglycerides", 0, "NOVA Creatinine", 0, "NOVA Glucose", 0, "NOVA Lactate", 0, "Alere Influenza A&B", 2, "Alere Hemostasis/Hematology/Immunoassay", 2, "Hemocue Glucose", 2, "HemoCue Hemoglobin", 2, "Medtronic Coagulation ACT Plus", 2, "Medtronic Coagulation HMS PLUS", 2, "Radiometer Blood Gas", 2, "Roche Glucose", 2, "Roche Blood Gas", 2, "Abbott i-STAT POC", 0, 2)
CustomField.label: * Pscore Device Connectivity
